drupalNodeEvent.title: Biden Deals with China Amidst Multiple Crises, Domestic and International

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_description.processed: David M. Lampton is Senior Fellow at the SAIS Foreign Policy Institute and Professor Emeritus at Johns Hopkins—SAIS. Immediately prior to his current post he was Oksenberg-Rohlen Fellow at Stanford University’s Asia-Pacific Research Center from 2019-2020. For more than two decades prior to that he was Hyman Professor and Director of China Studies at the Johns Hopkins University School of Advanced International Studies.
